reviews.title: Batram
reviews.comment: This game is a rip off. The dealer must be that magician Blaine. It takes all ur chips to get you to buy more. No thanks to lose em to the dealer. Please take this in mind or get out the market. Waste of space if you can\'t fix it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost unplayable.
reviews.comment: Game doesnt work on samsung galaxy tab.  It turns to portrait mode, and cuts the board in half. Most of the game is not accessible to touch.. only \"stay\" button is visible.  Only the corner of the hit button is seen and often stays not hits when pressed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great lil game
reviews.comment: fast paced, great game, works great on my LG840 too many improbable dealer 20/21\'s, but still great
reviews.author: Chris Krier

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: Pretty good app. Wish it wasn\'t just me and the dealer however. More people would make it seem realistic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DEALER OFTEN LUCKY BUT GREAT GAME!!
reviews.comment: Truly fun and addictive app. Dealer can hose you for 6-8 deals in a row, but that just leaves you wanting more. - Drew Love
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Txstarr... Fun games
reviews.comment: Txstart I love this game! Lots of fun one of my favorite games!.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap!!
reviews.comment: The app opens but wont let me go to a table and play. I get error massege. \"Unfortunately the blackjack stopped working\" fix this then i give 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes before you can play...
reviews.comment: The game loads and then when you go to start a game it just closes without warning... Can\'t play at all... Very disappointing... Using an EVO LTE with JB...
reviews.author: Wesley Ulmer

reviews.title: Might now be the best to some users but...
reviews.comment: It\'s got ME playing every day!... I never get enough of it! DOPE GAME! ... But then again I\'m just another Droid user out of billions out there... So don\'t listen to me lol...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game SUCKS
reviews.comment: The actual game is great but this game is programmed to give busts almost everytime and the board always have a higher hand that you. Not recomended
reviews.author: Guilio Marin

reviews.title: Great App!!
reviews.comment: Love that you get 2500 gold every day you open it plus easy ways to earn more.. Easy to use and fast! -Motorola RAZR
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ~QnD~
reviews.comment: Good game play...  seems that deck is stacked with alot of low cards.  But betting a progression you can still stay on table.  I have a 40% win overall and still able to make the Chips flow in !
reviews.author: ERIC P

reviews.title: Fun to a certain degree
reviews.comment: This game is pretty fun but as you play for more than 30mins you can easily see that it\'s rigged. The cards aren\'t generated randomly. Anytime I get a Queen and a 2, 90% of the time the next card is a king or queen.  I\'m quite good at this game from being in real casinos but the win ratio isn\'t realistic. The dealer wins about 70% of the time by usually getting black jacks or by one more card even if you\'re on 19/20. Fun in small amounts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice NJ
reviews.comment: Very nice. Easy to play. Love it!!! Love it!!! My wife keeps stealing my phone to play!!!
reviews.author: greg franklin

reviews.title: Can\'t play
reviews.comment: I love blackjack and dragonplay but this app just doesnt wanna work with my phone. Every time it starts it force stops and sends me to my home screen. Buzzkill.
reviews.author: Tyler Stevenson

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Very good visuals and easy to operate. Very good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rigged for dealer!!!!!!
reviews.comment: I firmly believe this game is rigged in favor of the dealer. I have won 28 out of 121 hands with 2 B/Js. Dealer has remarkedly had approx 45 B/Js. D hits 21 often... Would be a really great game if the developers did not rig it to cheat..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This game sucks
reviews.comment: Dealer consistently hits 20\'s. I\'ve never experienced so many dealer blackjacks. Your latest update was terrible!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Live not so live  CANDIGIRL072
reviews.comment: I like the game and all, but it doesn\'t feel or play like a live online game.  Would be nice to play with real people and not just the computer, I mean dealer.  Live to me also means competion.  I can buy a handheld BJ game to do the same as this game.  Wait, I have some in a drawer somewhere.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good entertaining game, simple and easy to understand
reviews.author: A Google User
